patterns: Tell me what you cannot do
responses: I'm in the early stages of development, so my functionality is very limited. I can't provide you with search results, for example. I can tell you the local time, but I don't have any weather functionalities, yet.

patterns: Tell me what you can do
responses: I'm an early model, so I can't really do much at the moment. However, I can tell you the time, find jokes, and hold simple conversations.
